snippet: “A Rite,” a new dance-theater work keyed to the centenary of “The Rite of Spring,” was performed by Bill T. Jones/Arnie Zane and SITI at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
abstract: Siobhan Burke reviews New York City premiere of dance-theater work A Rite, choreographed by Anne Bogart, Bill T Jones and Janet Wong and performed by Bill T Jones/Arnie Zane Dance Company and SITI Co at Brooklyn Academy of Music as part of its Next Wave Festival.
lead_paragraph: “A Rite,” a new dance-theater work keyed to the centenary of “The Rite of Spring,” was performed by Bill T. Jones/Arnie Zane and SITI at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.

headline.seo: Bill T. Jones/Arnie Zane and SITI Present ‘A Rite’
headline.main: When Parisians Stormed Out, and the Earth Trembled
headline.print_headline: When Parisians Stormed Out, and the Earth Trembled
